class.name: Script
class.brief_description: A class stored as a resource.
class.description: A class stored as a resource. The script exends the functionality of all objects that instance it. The 'new' method of a script subclass creates a new instance. [method Object.set_script] extends an existing object, if that object's class matches one of the script's base classes.

method.name: can_instance
method.description: Returns true if the script can be instanced.

method.name: get_source_code
method.description: Returns the script source code, or an empty string if source code is not available.

method.name: has_script_signal
method.description: Returns true if the script, or a base class, defines a signal with the given name.

method.name: has_source_code
method.description: Returns true if the script contains non-empty source code.

method.name: instance_has
method.description: Returns true if 'base_object' is an instance of this script.

method.name: is_tool
method.description: Returns true if the script is a tool script. A tool script can run in the editor.

method.name: reload
method.description: Reloads the script's class implementation. Returns an error code.

method.name: set_source_code
method.description: Sets the script source code. Does not reload the class implementation.
